title: 15th August 1941: Last execution at the Tower of London takes place when German spy Josef Jakobs is killed by firing squad
itunes:summary: Josef Jakobs was found guilty of espionage by General Court Martial and taken to the miniature firing range at the Tower of London where he was strapped to a wooden Windsor chair and killed by firing squad at ...
dc:creator: History Pod
